12-25.title: AT PEACE WITH LIFE
12-25.quote: Every day is a day when we must carry the vision of God's will into all of our activities. "How can I best serve Theeâ€”Thy will (not mine) be done."
content: I read this passage each morning, to start off my day, because it is a continual reminder to "practice these principles in all my affairs." When I keep God's will at the forefront of my mind, I am able to do what Ishouldbe doing, and that puts me at peace with life, with myself and with God.
